description:
SACRED CHASM : Silent Utopia

This project is INCREDIBLY unfinished, and also only a small piece of an even BIGGER project. Come back for updates!

(I didn't want to post this game yet, since it's still hardly finished, but I need to make 1500$ to pay off debt, otherwise all my content is going to have to be taken down for good. Me and my family are currently struggling to pay this off while barely scraping by to make enough for food, so PLEASE consider supporting this project...)

It is also highly encouraged you join the TESTING SERVER to keep track of bugs and glitches, as well as receive news and updates on this project!

This game is going to be its own standalone series, as well as be included (with exclusive levels) in my other series, Project Re:VOLVEvia the arcade room!

(NAMES OF EARLY SUPPORTERS WILL GET ADDED TO THE CREDITS OF THE GAME IF YOU'D LIKE)

What is Sacred Chasm about?

Sacred Chasm is a vertical danmaku style shoot-em-up game, about two coyotes, Taro and Kiaan, who fend off to take down divine supernatural calamities, known as the CHASM.

* Menu Theme:

NiKU - Journey into SILENT UTOPIA

* Pre-Control Theme:

Wetpeynt-ID

* Stage 1 Theme:
NiKU - The Midnight Chase : Wind of Ice

* Stage 2 Theme:
Breakchild - Eternal Hyendae Slumber
